content.question: A cylindrical wire segment with length <math alttext="0.25 meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.25</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math> and diameter <math alttext="3.0 times 10 to the negative 3 power, meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mpadded></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math> dissipates energy at a rate of <math alttext="6.0 times 10 to the negative 4 power, watt" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mpadded></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math> when a current of <math alttext="0.50 amp" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.50</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> is in the wire segment. Which of the following is approximately equal to the resistivity of the wire?

choices.label: <math alttext="6.8 times 10 to the negative 8 power, ohm meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mpadded><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mpadded></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">·</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>

<math alttext="9.0 times 10 to the negative 5 power, ohm meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>9.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mpadded><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mpadded></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">·</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>

<math alttext="7.5 times 10 to the negative 3 power, ohm meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>7.5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mpadded><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mpadded></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">·</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>

<math alttext="840 ohm meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>840</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">·</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="6.8 times 10 to the negative 8 power, ohm meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>6.8</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mpadded><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mpadded></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">·</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
